description: Desktop notifications when Claude needs attention or completes tasks

_scripts.notify.sh:
#!/bin/bash

# Cross-platform notification
MESSAGE="${NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE:-Claude needs your attention}"

if command -v notify-send &> /dev/null; then
  # Linux
  notify-send "Claude Code" "$MESSAGE"
elif command -v osascript &> /dev/null; then
  # macOS
  osascript -e "display notification \"$MESSAGE\" with title \"Claude Code\""
elif command -v powershell.exe &> /dev/null; then
  # Windows (WSL)
  powershell.exe -Command "[System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadWithPartialName('System.Windows.Forms'); [System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox]::Show('$MESSAGE', 'Claude Code')"
fi
_scripts.task-complete.sh:
#!/bin/bash

# Play sound and show notification
MESSAGE="Task completed!"

if command -v notify-send &> /dev/null; then
  notify-send "Claude Code" "$MESSAGE"
  paplay /usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/complete.oga 2>/dev/null || true
elif command -v osascript &> /dev/null; then
  osascript -e "display notification \"$MESSAGE\" with title \"Claude Code\" sound name \"Glass\""
fi
